The recording of Friday's Science Showcase is up! New insights into molecular tests and massive sequencing #SARSCoV2 variants: distribution, detection and prioritisation #SARSCoV2 variants: patients and prevention https://t.co/HC0Xp6h1nx
RT @TheQuadram: We're proud to be a partner of @CovidGenomicsUK, delivering large-scale, rapid whole-genome sequencing of SARS-CoV-2 One
RT @MattBashton: It's been amazing to be part of this project for the last year, sequencing SARS-CoV-2 as part of @CovidGenomicsUK with the
RT @nanopore: Over a year at the forefront of #SARSCoV2 genomic epidemiology, @TheQuadram reflect on the collective effort of @CovidGenomic
RT @msinnott123: It was a pleasure to be able to speak, many thanks to the @CovidGenomicsUK organisers for a great afternoon of talks! http
Don't worry if you missed the #COGScienceShowcase We will be sharing a recording of the event next week So watch this space

A huge thank you to all our amazing speakers and chairs @catherineludden @CLongstaff @templeton_kate @DrLMJackson @robertson_lab @AineToole @msinnott123 @alecarabo @judith_breuer @_nickdavies @wendybarclay11 Dr Sally Corden Prof Sharon Peacock #COGUKScienceShowcase
Next up, we have @wendybarclay11 from @imperialcollege discussing #SARSCoV2 variants, vaccines and immune escape #COGUKScienceShowcase
Now, @_nickdavies from @LSHTM (@CMMID_lshtm) is exploring whether the B.1.1.7 #SARSCoV2 variant causes more severe disease #COGUKScienceShowcase
Next up, Dr Sally Corden from @PublicHealthW introduces @judith_breuer from @ucl, who will be discussing #SARSCoV2 variants and what we can learn from the HOCI study #COGUKScienceShowcase
Now, @alecarabo from @Cambridge_Uni will be speaking about prioritising #SARSCoV2 mutations and variants #COGUKScienceShowcase
Next, we have @msinnott123 discussing #SARSCoV2 mutation and variant surveillance at the @sangerinstitute #COGUKScienceShowcase
Up next, @robertson_lab introduces @AineToole from @EdinburghUni who will be providing an overview of the global epidemiology of #SARSCoV2 lineages of global concern #COGUKScienceShowcase
Now @DrLMJackson, Scientific Project Manager at COG-UK, will be discussing non-sequence based molecular methods to detect #SARSCoV2 variants #COGUKScienceShowcase
Next up, we have @templeton_kate from @EdinburghUni speaking on #SARSCoV2 mutations and diagnostic test accuracy #COGUKScienceShowcase
Up first... @catherineludden introduces @CLongstaff from the @sangerinstitute who is discussing lessons learned from large-scale #SARSCoV2 sequencing #COGUKScienceShowcase https://t.co/H4O2NniML8
STARTING NOW https://t.co/POHWvuYDgs
